column2: Royce Micro-Cap Trust, Inc. (the Fund) is a diversified closed-end investment company. The Fund invests primarily in micro-cap securities. The Fund invests in a range of sectors, including information technology, software, technology hardware, storage and peripherals, chemicals, construction materials, containers and packaging, metals and mining, real estate, telecommunication services, utilities and miscellaneous. The Fund may invest a portion of its net assets in foreign securities, which may involve political, economic, currency and other risks not encountered in the United States investments. Royce & Associates, LP serves as its investment advisor.
